channel.title: Creating a multiple botted client
channel.description: How would i go about making a multiple bot client? I heard you could use the Objects HashCode, but i'm not sure how i would go about doing this. In other words, in my hacked java.awt.Canvas, when the constructor is called i get the instance of a running bot that corresponds to it's instance.

item.title: Creating a multiple botted client
item.dc:creator: @Entropy Entropy
item.description:
@Entropy wrote:

How would i go about making a multiple bot client? I heard you could use the Objects HashCode, but i’m not sure how i would go about doing this. In other words, in my hacked java.awt.Canvas, when the constructor is called i get the instance of a running bot that corresponds to it’s instance.

Read full topic
